detectors.description: Issuer.issue(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#233-238) uses arbitrary from in transferFrom: token.transferFrom(allower,benefactor,amount) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#235)

Issuer.issue(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#233-238) ignores return value by token.transferFrom(allower,benefactor,amount) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#235)

Reentrancy in Issuer.issue(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#233-238):
	External calls:
	- token.transferFrom(allower,benefactor,amount) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#235)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- issued[benefactor] = true (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#236)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Issuer.issue(address,uint256)](../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#L233-L238):
	External calls:
	- [token.transferFrom(allower,benefactor,amount)](../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#L235)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [issued[benefactor] = true](../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#L236)

detectors.description:

	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#194)

Issuer.Issuer(address,address,StandardToken)._allower (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#227) lacks a zero-check on :

Issuer.Issuer(address,address,StandardToken)._owner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#227) lacks a zero-check on :

Reentrancy in Issuer.issue(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/00712a531e207ad77e42586fb81e9fb8f68f0a7d_Issuer.sol#233-238):
	External calls:
